title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma…) with a single CLI or REST API; ships macOS/Linux binaries and Docker images.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client and async helpers; install via PyPI, auto-detects local Ollama server.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK published on npm; works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers (via proxy).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package for Ollama; exposes chat, embeddings, tool-calling and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI (chat, multi-user, RAG, file uploads, dark mode); one Docker command to run.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI for browsing/pulling/chatting with Ollama models; built with Python Rich.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS-Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement; inline completions + chat sidebar.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Android compatible, Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG starter: Python script to ingest PDFs, generate embeddings with Ollama, and chat over documents.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and PVC support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook: 30+ recipes for function calling, voice bots, Slack bots, Next.js, Flutter, etc.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language wrapper for Ollama’s REST API; async HTTP, nimble install ollama.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama; crates.io/ollama-rs.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Curated compose stacks combining Ollama, WebUI, Postgres, QDrant, and LibreChat for one-command local dev.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model-Context-Protocol server exposing Ollama chat & embeddings to any MCP client (Claude Desktop, Continue.dev).

title: ollama-kit
summary: Swift Package for iOS/macOS apps to chat with Ollama; Swift Concurrency, publish on SwiftPM.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component that auto-detects and lists local Ollama models; supports multi-turn & parameters.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that brings any Ollama model into your server with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for private AI assistance: summarize notes, generate Q&A, and autocomplete using local Ollama.
